FuncDef: This command imports IPv6 Secure Neighbor Discovery (SeND) certificates from a file, and saves them to cf[1..3]:\system-pki\secureNdKey in PKCS #7 DER format.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of an input file up to 99 characters in length.
Specifies the input file format. Values-pkcs12, pem, or der.
Specifies the password to decrypt the input file if it is an encrypted PKCS#12 file. Values-32 characters maximum.
